de.hsb.ms.syn.desktop

Class SynthesizerRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsb.ms.syn.desktop.SynthesizerRenderer

  • public class SynthesizerRenderer
extends Object
    Rendering unit of the Synthesizer. This Singleton is responsible for the correct display of relevant components, such as the Node graph structure.
    Author:
    Marcel
